alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 4:51PM MDT until June 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MEADE AND SOUTHEASTERN LAWRENCE COUNTIES... At 450 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Piedmont, or 13 miles southeast of Sturgis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Summerset around 455 PM MDT. Black Hawk around 500 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ellsworth Air Force Base and northern Box Elder. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 39 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
